Posts.HTML: I want to try my game on android phone. But I cannot save my game '.apk' or How do I save my game '.question' file. I am beginner so I need your help Thanks for the answers ! ^^

Posts.EditableText: If you just want to *play* your game on Android, the best bet is to upload the .quest file to the textadventures web site and then play the game using the Android web browser. There is no simple, easy, reliable way to convert a Quest game to an Android APK.
Posts.HTML: If you just want to *play* your game on Android, the best bet is to upload the .quest file to the textadventures web site and then play the game using the Android web browser. There is no simple, easy, reliable way to convert a Quest game to an Android APK.
